div.p: If you had 1 million euros, what would you do with it?

I want to travel in cold countries because there are a lot of beautiful landshape and i find that's more interessant than an hot countries because the nature is very developed, there are a lot of species.

You can do many discovered about yourself when you are alone in the wild. I want to train to survive myself. i want to discover me on another world that we know. i will see if i can survive without own society if the world that we have created is the only one or if there is something else. I hope that there is something because it s very sad that we live with the same habits all over the round. Now we haven't many different between us and we are poor. the world is poor and more poor, the people want more power and they can kill some other people for that. I don't want to see this all in my live.
